# uploadJobExtensionEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether background asset resource uploading is enabled.

## Declaration

```swift
var uploadJobExtensionEnabled: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

The value is `true` if the extension is enabled and active, and is `false` otherwise.

The extension’s host app uses this property to determine the background processing status. See [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHAssetResourceUploadJob] and ````PHAssetResourceUploadJobChangeRequest`` for more information.

## Enabling an Upload Job Extension

- **setUploadJobExtensionEnabled(_:)**: Enables or disables the background asset resource upload job feature.

items.description: Enables or disables the background asset resource upload job feature.
